caption: In my opinion the besides L&B they have the best square slices in the neighborhood.
You can not go wrong here, not only does Mike have all kinds of pizza, they have a kitchen menu as well with heroes and pastas
I would not eat at this place again
Always a pleasure having their delicious pizza, &  hero’s from them always made fresh to order
Had the Margarita slice and have to say that the pizza sauce was great! Chunky and flavorful.
Great pizza all the time.

The Pizza is nothing less than delicious.  I went there with a friend many years ago that owned a pizzeria and when he parked I said what are you doing here. Is answer was this is the place where people  that own pizzeria 's come and I didn't know how to answer that. Mike the owner is a old school Pizza man but don't try to rush him , greatness takes time.
This place has amazing service and delicious food. The best restaurant in the area. The meals served quickly and the rates are economical. Highly recommended.
(Translated by Google) Good pizza  (Original) Buena pizza
The customer service is regularly fast, excellent vibes, kind staff. Will eat here again when I am in town.
No decor-slap dash service-delicious food This place lives up to its reputation.IL just ate there with four friends.What we ate:appetizers,stuffed fried zuchini flowers, marrow bones, and meatballs.l

The food was over priced for the quality. I ordered the meatball appetizer the meatballs were tender and good but the red sauce was overly acidic and bitter downright unpleasant. I also had the organic tomato and mozzarella perscuto pizza the sauce was much sweeter not bitter which was nice a little greasy on top from the perscuto the crust was the best part. Quite disappointed in the quality for a Joe Bistinach Mario Bitale caliber place. I love watching him on Masterchef and have read his book etc focuses on quality and authentic food I was unimpressed
Best pizza around. I wouldn't order from anywhere else. Burgers are amazing as well.
The quality is great, with fare prices
Delicious pizza, clean nice and cozy place. The place has a few tables outside which is nice during Covid. ❤️

I eat here frequently and I am never let down. I have tried almost everything on the menu and I have never been disappointed. The people who work there are super friendly and provided 5 star service. I LOVE their garlic knots. This place has been a staple in the community for years. They have been open during the entire pandemic and I have mainly lived off their food since I hate to cook.

I ordered what was supposed to be a grilled chicken salad with no olives and extra onions and got the complete opposite and on top of taking over 45 minutes the chicken was cold and I was given what ever dressing they felt like it. Extremely dissatisfied with my order experience.....even the online menu was a hassle. Safe to say I won't be ordering from here again.
Such delicious pizza!! Staff is so friendly and pizza is always amazing. Been coming here for years!
Great neighborhood spot!
The last time I went to Papa Mike's very nice people but sad to say I got very after sick after I ate there.

Been going there since I can remember I'm 31 so I'd say about 30 years give or take.. if you want quality food this is the place to order from.. the philly cheese steak hero is by far my favorite thing there and the pizza is just about the best NY slice you're gunna get.. just an fyi if you come in close to closing time don't expect there to be many choices left but that's expected they're not going to make everything really late just to throw it out.. it's always my go to when I order in.. By the way the name says it's posted by Richard but it's Mario from 74th street around the corner..
excellent place to eat and take food home.
Good pizza
Great pizza
Very good place to eat at. I liked the quality, taste, service, prices. It is very cozy and warm inside. Staff is very friendly and helpful. I liked it there a lot.
The pizza and the rest of the food was great. I go there almost every weekend.
real Italian pizza great food
Good pizzia... nice owner.  Sweet guy...affordable prices.
Good pizza
Perfect everytime
Super delicious staff is friendly best pizza in New York
This place use to be good thats ll i can say, you never get your order right and very expensive Payed $31 for grilled chicken one pasta and one hero

I ordered a chicken parm hero It had no cheese the sandwich was cold and very dry Never again
The best pizza in bensonhurst. The owner is the best love that guy!!! Always get pizza for this place only. I always get pizza from this place for my daughter's birthday party everyone loves it!!!
Very good, excellent prices and excellent service. Recommended for quick I bite or a leisurely meal

Everything here is delicious. From pizza to eggplant parmesan,chicken cutlet parmesan meatballs and spaghetti dishes or heroes. Even the minestrone soup in the winter is as good as my mom used to make. They even have a catering hall next door that they cater for small parties. Affordable prices and great food. Can't be beat!  You won't be disappointed!
Good pizza / pasta too
Awesome pizza
The margarita pie that the older gentleman named Mike makes it best. The only reason i go there for Mike.
The pizzas here are delicious, the staff is very friendly and the delivery service is quite fast
Love this place.  Food is great
Helpful and good food

Fair, cheese kept falling off. Had a lot better, had a lot worse
One of the best all-around pizzerias in borough
Great pizza and relaxing place to eat.
I've been eating there for over 40 years he is the Best around this neighborhood
Great pizza
Got a garden salad with grilled chicken. It was great.  Salad was fresh, chicken well done.   Much better value than Subway.

Neighborhood pizza for years and still has great taste love the grandma slices !!
Very good food at a good price

The service here is great! The food is just as amazing! Everything came out quickly and was nice and hot. The prices are reasonable as well. You can come in for a quick slice to eat or a great pasta dinner and so much more. They even have a hall to host events which I am seriously considering for a family event. I live in Jersey but this place is well worth the trip!!
Might be the best pizza in Brooklyn nfs , idk any spots better .

Awesome place. Delicious pizza!!!
Best pizza in Brooklyn. The catering area is beautifully done. The food was delicious and the price can't be beat. I would highly recommend!
The food could be better.
Good  neighborhood  eats Great chicken  parmigiana

Very good pizza, the dough is cooked to perfection , the sauce is nice with a sweet / salty taste and generous amount of mozzarella !!! The rest of the food is delish too!  A very clean welcoming place!!! The catering hall is BEAUTIFUL!! AWESOME PLACE TO HAVE A PARTY!!! Papa Mike's is extremely good!!!
Good food and good prices. The shop is super clean and tidy and staff are very friendly.
Good food.

Good pizza. Not the best,  but pretty good.  Worth thr money.  I eat there often.

BEST F-ING PIZZA IN BROOKLYN I COME FROM ANY WHERE JUST TO EAT HERE IF YOU WANT REAL PIZZA THIS IS THE SPOT HANDS DOWN
My favorite pizza around

I ordered a large Cheese Pizza. Came out to about 13 and change. The pizza was pretty good. I took a longer trip to try Papa Mike's pizza since some of the pizzerias near me around that great. I'll come back to Papa Mike's for sure.
Tried and liked the food.  Will be having a baby shower there.
Good family owned pizza shop
Good pizza
My fave place to manja
Love the slice selection also the owner is a old guy that loves what he does and takes so much pride in his business
T H E  B E S T

I would not recommend this restaurant to anyone! Horrible, horrible food. The only reason they are getting one star is because the Amazon delivery happened in the estimated delivery window. I bought a $1.25 can of sprite, got a Ginger Ale. I was supposed to get two sodas, and only got one. I'm just amazed that not only did they forget the quantity of sodas, but forgot the type I asked for. It gets worse. The "cheese breadsticks" are just cheap and awful smelling American Cheese slices molten onto bread. The "garlic knots" are small twists of dough with very artificial (and god knows what it really was) garlic sprinkled on top. I had also ordered a cheeseburger with fries and soda. If you absolutely MUST order from this restaurant, please avoid the cheeseburger deluxe entirely. They didn't include a soda, the fries are stale and cold, and the burger has no cheese, is super dry and chewy for some reason, and cold.The mozzarella sticks smelled like week old oil, were super fried to the point where it was like biting into a thin wooden stick.  Finally, the mozzarella sticks. I ended up throwing away the entire meal for the fear of getting sick from eating it all. I just couldn't understand why the food smelled so terrible, it was like something out of kitchen nightmares!! I wish I could get my money back, but will know to avoid this restaurant in the future.
Great pizza.  Fresh mozzarella.

Best service & taste. The Amazon delivery messed up the delivery address. To fulfil my order the Pizzeria owner drove his car by himself to deliver the food to my door with apology 2lt bottle of soda. The great place with people of big heart! Thank you.
The best pizzeria in this city. Grandma pie and calamari basket are 10/10. Let the hipsters eat at Di Fara and pay 3 times more for the same pizza Mike makes. I've been coming here for over 15 years.
My kids wanted a half buffalo & half regular pizza...WOW!  the best pizza we've had. Great ambiance.  Great owners & staff.  You must come here to eat & host your parties!
Best pizza!!!
The food and Pizza is delicious.
Mike has been there since 1971
Nice atmosphere with great Italian food.

Great regular slice and many other delicious foods. Mike is always there to greet customers. The staff is friendly and fast. PS they now have a Hall next door for your special events. Modern looking and big enough.
Best pizza in Brooklyn
Good friendly staff. Love it. Good Pizza😊💕
Great local pizza and specialty pizza.  In or take out.  Stop in you'll enjoy Papas
Beautiful place with delicious food. Feels little Italy.
best pizza in the neighborhood !!!! their portions are HUMONGOUS AND PRICES REASONABLE !!! their PASTAS ARE SUPERB !!!!! MT FAV PIZZA PLACE FOR MANY MANY YEARS !!!!!!
Good food and remarkably consistent for Brooklyn.

I have ordered several times from here, always timely and has real good mozzarella sticks(not like many places around here!).  One problem that led to the 4 star instead of 5 star rating was that we were told once that they were delivering "as a courtesy"(it was only one delivery guy that said this) even though we're on 20th avenue, not that far away, and asked us to order with a minimum of 15$.  I understand the sentiment but it's not really cool to request such things.  ANYWAY.  Love this place and its mozz sticks and pizza.  And garlic knots.  And fries.
Very few places like this left in brooklyn always top quality
Delicious with wondeful atmosphere.
Lovely place, family friendly and delicious food
Best pizza in brooklyn period👍
Mike is the Best...e Napolitano ... 42yrs ....grazia miguel
Probably the best pizza in Brooklyn (and I had A LOT of different pizza in Brooklyn).  Mike is a sweet old man and always makes every pizza with the utmost care.
Really good pizza
Excellent chicken rollatini, pizza, eggplant sandwich recommend Papa Mike's highly

My family recently moved to the area and tried a few of the local pizza shops but this one was by far the best.  We met the owner,a nice older gentleman, who told us his family opened up almost 40 years ago.  The restaurant is very clean with an A rating.  We ordered a sicilian pie and a few wraps which were delicious. The prices are very fair and the order sizes are generous. I would recommend Papa Mike's to anyone in this area.
Very Bad Delivery Service!!!
(Translated by Google) The pizza is very tasty  (Original) Está muy sabrosa la pizza
A little neighborhood gem. Best Grandma pizza I ever had. We usually get delivery on Fridays and call in advance as they can get busy.
Pizza is good but was alot better at one point also delivery takes way to LONG we live 3 blocks away and pizza is always cold by the time we get it , eating here since I was a kid love the place

He can make any type of pizza you want!  My favorite is the one with all the toppings, cheese mushroom, ham and artichokes! He makes all the pizza's himself, good old fashion Italian family man! Simply the best!

This pizza is starting to get worse and the cheesy bread all they did was put regular yellow cheese over the bread, I thought it was gonna be like the ones from dominos and papa johns. Overall the pizza was okay.
They used to have excellent pizza, but recently it's gotten much worse. Toppings are not fresh, which ruins the whole pie.
